revised_title: Catalogue of Royal Society's Medals and Their Historical Significance
tldr: This article provides a detailed catalogue of the medals in the possession of the Royal Society, including descriptions of their designs, historical significance, and the scientists they honor. The medals represent various achievements in the fields of science, medicine, and technology, and serve as a testament to the Royal Society's commitment to promoting scientific progress and recognizing outstanding contributions to the scientific community.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science
